meanings.definition: The quality or state of being allegorical.
meanings.sent1: The allegoricalnesses of the fable helped convey its deeper meaning.
meanings.sent2: The allegoricalnesses of the painting made it open to interpretation.
meanings.sent3: The allegoricalnesses of the play added a layer of complexity to the storyline.
meanings.sent4: Her storytelling had an allegoricalnesses that captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The allegoricalnesses of the poem painted vivid images in the reader's mind.

meanings.definition: The use of allegory in a literary work.
meanings.sent1: The allegoricalnesses in the novel made it a thought-provoking read.
meanings.sent2: The author's allegoricalnesses added depth to the story.
meanings.sent3: The allegoricalnesses of the book made readers reflect on its hidden meanings.
meanings.sent4: His allegoricalnesses in writing were praised by critics.
meanings.sent5: The allegoricalnesses of the tale left a lasting impact on the audience.

meanings.definition: The presence of allegorical elements in a story or artwork.
meanings.sent1: The allegoricalnesses of the film were evident in its symbolic imagery.
meanings.sent2: The painting's allegoricalnesses added layers of interpretation.
meanings.sent3: The allegoricalnesses of the sculpture made viewers ponder its message.
meanings.sent4: The allegoricalnesses of the story resonated with the audience.
meanings.sent5: The allegoricalnesses of the artwork sparked discussions among art enthusiasts.
